name: Party Guardians
description:
Game Title: Party Guardians
Game Summary/Overview:

 -This is a Survival Hack and Slash Game made for the 40th Game Anniversary Game Jam Challenge:

 -You and a Friend Are About to Enjoy a Nice Party, but the Cake-Thirsty Skeletons Want to eat your Delicious Cake. They Invade and it's up to you to stop them.
Just for a Cake...

There are 4 levels for each character:

-Archer: 4 Levels.

-Warrior: 4 Levels
There are 2 characters to choose from to play as:

The Voidwalker (Archer):

- Unleash Storms Of Arrows Upon Your Foes With Your Bow Of Dark Quenching Power.

- Controls:

--> Use WASD to move around

--> Mouse Right Click: Shoot Bow Right

--> Mouse Left Click: Shoot Bow Left

--> Release Key "E" to Evade Right

--> Release Key "Q" to Evade Left

--> Stage 4 Unlock: Your Arrows Effectiveness Has Substantially Increased,  your arrows Pierce Through All Targets. (Passive)

The Star Falcon (Warrior)

- Swing Your Axe Of Glory, Crash Into The Battlefield, Ignite The Fire.

Controls:

--> Use WASD to move around

--> Mouse Right Click: Slash Axe Right

--> Mouse Left Click: Slash Axe Left

--> Stage 4 Unlock: You Have Gained a new ability, the skill, to Bring Down your axe of Imminent Impending Doom as An AOE Slam. (Key = "Ctrl")

Killing Skeletons Has a small chance to drop a Healing Potion on the Battlefield, to use it, left click it to replenish a segment of your health.

Why do Skeletons like cake? Well...

Just Don't Let them Eat it...

Just Don't.

Will you succeed as a Guardian?

Can you save the Cake?

Try It now!

Please vote +Like on the Gamemaker Forums If you liked it!

Thanks!

Made By Zachary Wasti
